title: [SETUP-BUG] Running "yarn start" fails when following contributors guide
body: ### System information - **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: - This happens on OS X M1(through run-test-container.sh) - disabled airflow (which was also listening on port 5000) - **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: mlflow, version 2.1.1.dev0 - **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: - **Python version**: - 3.8 ### Code to reproduce issue yarn start from inside the container ### Describe the problem I can run the `mlflow ui` command (and I et the correct message about: `Unable to display MLflow UI - landing page (index.html) not found.` However, when I run the `yarn start` command: I always get this error: ``` oot@f452cf900a9c:/app/mlflow/server/js# yarn start (node:25616) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: /app/mlflow/server/js/craco.config.js:72 .filter((oneOf) => oneOf.test?.toString() === /\.css$/.toString()) ^ SyntaxError: Unexpected token '.' at wrapSafe (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:915:16) at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:963:27) at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1027:10) at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:863:32) at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:708:14) at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:887:19) at module.exports (/app/mlflow/server/js/node_modules/import-fresh/index.js:32:59) at loadJs (/app/mlflow/server/js/node_modules/cosmiconfig/dist/loaders.js:16:18) at ExplorerSync.loadFileContentSync (/app/mlflow/server/js/node_modules/cosmiconfig/dist/ExplorerSync.js:84:26) at ExplorerSync.createCosmiconfigResultSync (/app/mlflow/server/js/node_modules/cosmiconfig/dist/ExplorerSync.js:89:30) (node:25616) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). To terminate the node process on unhandled promise rejection, use the CLI flag `--unhandled-rejections=strict` (see https://nodejs.org/api/cli.html#cli_unhandled_rejections_mode). (rejection id: 2) (node:25616) [DEP0018] DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code. root@f452cf900a9c:/app/mlflow/server/js# * History restored root@f452cf900a9c:/app/mlflow/server/js# ``` Has anyone seen something similar? ### Other info / logs I also tried to run `yarn start` directly on my mac (mlflow running inside container). In that case I don't get the error condition, but I just get a timeout trying to reach 127.0.0.1:3000 like the image
